short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze job descriptions and identify keywords missing from your resume.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get more interviews with Jobalytics.

Jobalytics is a resume analyzer designed to help you get your resume past applicant tracking systems (ATS’s) that review your resume before recruiters see them. It uses artificial intelligence to help you strategically tailor your resume to the job listing you are applying for so you can stand out to the recruiters as a top candidate for that position. It does this by analyzing all the important keywords of a job description and highlighting for you which one of the important keywords your resume is missing so you can add them to your resume. With a highly optimized resume, you will be ranked as a top candidate by the ATS’s, making the recruiters eager to reach out to you, and your chances of moving forward in the application process and getting an interview will be significantly higher. 

Jobalytics is 100% free and works on every job board and any job listing online. 


FEATURES 


Match Score
Get an instant match score from 0-100, rating how well your resume matches a job description. This will save you an enormous amount of time by helping you quickly filter through thousands of jobs and identify the most relevant jobs to you so you can focus your energy on applying for the top jobs instead of less relevant ones. 


Keyword Analysis
Find all the important keywords on a job description so you can add the missing ones to your resume and increase your match score. This will help you improve your chances of passing the Applicant Tracking Systems and getting in front of recruiters.


Recommended jobs 
Jobalytics finds you jobs that have a high match score with your resume from across the web and presents them to you so you can focus your effort on applying to the top jobs,  save lots of time in your job search, and get more interviews faster.
